name: multilayer
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
consisting of several layers: The company manufactures multilayer insulation boards. Fold a paper towel in half five times to form a multi-layer pad. Synonym
multi-layered
consisting of several parts or stages: The antivirus software has multilayer security for PCs. Because multi-layer managerial approval is needed before making investments, it is often difficult for larger organizations to make fast decisions. Synonym
multi-layered
More examplesFewer examplesThey showed us a multilayer model of the atmosphere.I made a multi-layer sponge cake, covered with beautiful rainbow-coloured icing.These banks led the move to multilayer authentication.Expert systems are capable of emulating human reasoning through learning the development of multi-layer rule based systems.
